channel.title: NCL applications in this Mini PC:
channel.description: Ginga Live CD contains demo applications to introduce some NCL features even if you are not online at the moment. These applications were developed by the TeleMidia Lab and can also be found in The NCL Club.

item.title: Garrincha and the First "João"
item.description: O Primeiro Joao (The First John) is a festival winning animation created by Andre Castelao under the coordination of Claudia Bolshaw and Marcos Magalhaes. The animation is inspired by an homonym chronicle about Garrincha written by Gerson Soares. This interactive application was developed by TeleMidia Lab for NCL learning purposes.

item.title: Ginga Hero
item.description: Ginga Hero is a musical game based on commercial greatest success games like GuitarHero and RockBand.

item.title: Proview Advertisements
item.description: "Proview Advertisements" is the first advertisement series created by Proview Produções to illustrate their vision about the interactive space that advertisers and companies can explore with Ginga-NCL.
